TopicTitle: The stock craft "Rocket Powered VTOL" is broken

Articles.Content: It doesn't have enough thrust to take off, from my testing. This should be fixed ASAP, either by removing it as a temporary thing, or replacing it with something better.
It's never been of much use to be honest, as it doesn't have enough fuel to do anything more than buzz around the space centre for a couple of minutes.
Something tells me they haven't messed with any of the stock craft since the changes haha!
All of the stock craft were purposely flawed in some way when they were introduced. Squad left it up to the player to figure out how to fix them.

> 
> All of the stock craft were purposely flawed in some way when they were introduced.

Yeah, but not this much. I don't really know why this is happening otherwise, so I'm just going to leave.
